name: Undercurrent
description: Release a current of water to damage foes and regenerate allies.

name: Electrified Tornado
description: Electrify your tornado form and make it shoot lightning.

name: Dust Tornado
description: Gather up dust into your tornado form, making it shoot out dust devils that blind foes.

name: Debris Tornado
description: Gather up debris into your tornado form and send it flying.

name: Renewal of Air
description: Glyph. Revive and teleport an ally to your location.

name: Renewal of Earth
description: Glyph. Revive allies around you.

name: Renewal of Fire
description: Glyph. Revive an ally; you're revived the next time you're downed.

name: Renewal of Water
description: Glyph. Revive an ally with full health.

name: Hurl
description: Hurl the rocks from your barrier at your foe.

name: Geyser
description: Create a geyser to heal nearby allies.

description: Create a bubble that blocks enemy missiles and grants resolution to allies.

name: Renewing Current
description: Escape toward the surface and heal.

name: Reveal the Depths
description: Damage foes in an area that grows larger.

name: Shackle
description: Cripple your foe with shackles.

name: Shield of Absorption
description: Detonate the dome to heal nearby allies.

name: Pull
description: Pull your foes to you.

name: Sword Wave
description: Send out waves of attacks that strike multiple targets.

name: Purifying Blast
description: Detonate the orb to burn foes and cure conditions on allies in the blast radius.

name: Smite Condition
description: Meditation. Cure conditions and damage nearby foes. Deal more damage if a condition is cured.

name: Merciful Intervention
description: Meditation. Shadowstep to an ally in the targeted area and heal around them. If no ally is present in the targeted area, this ability will not shadowstep.

name: Judge's Intervention
description: Meditation. Teleport to your target and burn nearby foes.

name: Contemplation of Purity
description: Meditation. Convert the conditions you are suffering from into boons.

name: Virtue of Resolve
description:
Virtue: Regenerates health.
Activate: Heal yourself and nearby allies.

name: Wall of Reflection
description: Consecration. Summon a barrier of mystic power that reflects projectiles.

Glamour. Create an entry portal at your location that teleports allies to your exit portal.
(Creating a new entrance portal while you have an active portal will destroy the active portal.)

name: Blink
description: Manipulation. Teleport to a target location.

Clone. Gain stealth and summon an illusion to attack your foe.

Virtuoso: Stock a blade.

name: Mirror Images
description:
Clone. Summon two clones to attack your foe.

Virtuoso: Stock two blades.

name: Null Field
description: Glamour. Create a field of energy that rips boons from foes and cures conditions on allies.

name: Mantra of Distraction
description: Mantra. Meditate, charging a spell that will daze your target. Diversion's recharge time is partially refunded when this spell fully charges.

name: Power Lock
description: Daze your target and nearby foes.

description:
Legendary Centaur. Collect energy, pulling it into the tablet to build up its power. After a short delay the energy will be released, healing nearby allies. 

If this skill is empowered, healing is increased and endurance is granted to affected allies.

name: Energy Expulsion
description:
Legendary Centaur. Force energy to erupt from the tablet, knocking down nearby foes and healing nearby allies. 

If this skill is empowered, grant stability to allies near the tablet.

name: Tail Stab
description: A heavy melee attack.

name: Warding Rift
description: Create a rift from the Mists that blocks incoming attacks. When the rift closes it blinds foes in front of you.

name: Protective Solace
description:
Legendary Centaur. Summon a protective barrier around the tablet that blocks enemy projectiles. 

If this skill is empowered, it also grants protection to allies around the tablet.

name: Renewing Wave
description: Release a burst of Mists energy that heals and removes conditions from allies. Create a healing orb for each ally that loses conditions.

name: Forceful Bash
description: Bash your foe with your staff.

This skill's recharge cannot be reset by other mesmer skills.

description: Matthias corrupts a target, dealing pulsing damage to all foes in an area. Can be cleansed by entering uncorrupted fountains.

name: Tantrum
description: Slothasor pounds the ground in irritation, causing violent tremors in the caves, dealing damage on impact, and knocking foes down.

name: Blood Shards
description: Matthias fires a stream of projectiles at a target. Reflected projectiles remove stacks of Blood Shield.

name: Volatile Poison
description: A pool of poison left behind after purging the volatile-poison condition.

name: Spore Release
description: Slothasor shakes spores off its back, damaging foes on impact.

name: Poison Spatter
description: The slubling spits multiple projectiles that convert boons to conditions upon hitting its target.

name: Crippling Thump
description: The slubling bounces, crippling nearby targets.

name: Volatile Aura
description: Slothasor pulses a volatile aura that deals damage to all foes within a 2000 range every 3 seconds.

name: Halitosis
description: Slothasor expels a blast of fiery breath, damaging and burning all foes in a cone of flames.

name: Zealous Benediction
description: Matthias inflicts multiple targets with an attack effect that explodes after a few seconds, damaging all foes in the area of impact.

name: Toxic Cloud
description: The poison mushroom releases a toxic cloud, damaging and applying poison to all foes standing within range.

name: Thunder
description: The storm clouds pulse damage every second to all targets standing under it.

name: Downpour
description: Matthias pulses downpour damage every 3 seconds to all targets in the area.

name: Toxic Cloud
description: The poison mushroom releases a toxic cloud, damaging and applying poison to all foes standing within range.

Ambush. Release a vortex of chaos energy that inflicts damaging conditions on foes. Allies near you gain boons. 
Clones using this attack grant their boons around you instead of themselves.

description:
Mark a target, causing your initiative attacks to generate malice when they hit or critically hit your mark. Lose malice when the mark ends or when this skill is recast on a new target.
Malice is only gained once per skill use.

name: Crystal Fling

name: Sand Cascade

Shade. Sand rises up near your shades to shield nearby allies.
Targets affected by this ability can only be affected once per cast.

name: Elixir of Bliss
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of bliss into an elixir, gaining resolution and converting conditions on yourself into life force, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, corrupting a boon on targets into a condition. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and corrupt an additional boon on targets.

name: Willbender Flames
description:
Leave a trail of flame in your wake that damage enemies.

Activating this skill destroys other active Willbender Flames effects.

name: Elixir of Risk
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of risk into an elixir, gaining might and fury, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting weakness on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and torment struck foes.

Virtue. Shadowstep a short distance while gaining boons and emanating Willbender Flames from your location. Gain Courage.

Removes other active Virtue effects.</c

name: Elixir of Ignorance
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of ignorance into an elixir, gaining resistance and breaking stuns, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting blindness on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

name: Elixir of Ambition
description:
Elixir. Infuse your boundless ambition into an elixir, gaining every possible boon, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting all damaging conditions on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

description: Damage and cripple nearby enemies.

name: Elixir of Anguish
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of anguish into an elixir, gaining swiftness and quickness, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting cripple on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

name: Elixir of Promise
description:
Elixir. Infuse an elixir with the promise of good health, healing yourself and gaining regeneration, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, poisoning foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double damage and condition duration.

name: Fortified Earth
description: Augment. Block attacks. Gain barrier if the channel completes successfully. If this is cast within range of your Earth Sphere, the recharge time is reduced.

name: Soothing Water
description: Augment. Regenerate health and cleanse conditions over time. If this is cast in range of your Water Sphere, the recharge time is reduced.

name: True Strike
description: Strike your foes with empowered energy. Deals increased damage based on attacks blocked by Imperial Guard.

name: Nomad's Advance
description: Legendary Alliance. Lunge forward, damaging foes and gaining might for each target struck.

description: Block the next incoming attack. If you block an attack, gain barrier and an aura based on your current attunement.

name: Rectifier Signet
description:
Signet Passive: Heal yourself and your mech every second.
Signet Active: Heal yourself and your mech.

name: Crash Down
description:
Summon your jade mech at the target area. Foes in the area are damaged. The recharge time of this skill is based on how damaged your mech is.

Right-click to rename your mech.

name: Vicious Pike
description: Unleashed Ambush.Spin and strike foes repeatedly. The final attack creates a spore under targets it strikes.

name: Shadow Bolt
description: Fire a projectile that hinders foes and helps allies.

name: Siphon
description: Steal.

name: Overbearing Smash
description: Quickly strike the ground, dazing nearby enemies. If this strikes an enemy, follow up with a leaping strike that dazes enemies again. If you strike an enemy that is using a skill, gain barrier.

name: Recall Mech
description:
Recall your mech for repairs. The cooldown of Crash Down is determined by the amount of damage your mech has taken.

Right-click to rename your mech.

Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

Signet Passive: Reduces recharge of other signets.
Signet Active: Order your mech to fire its ultimate weapon, the jade buster cannon. If your mech is not present, instead your mech is summoned, even if Crash Down is on cooldown.

name: Shift Signet
description:
Signet Passive: Increases movement speed. Boons you gain are copied to your mech.
Signet Active: You and your mech shadowstep to the target location. Remove conditions on you and your mech.

Signet Active: Creates a damaging field around you that applies conditions to nearby foes. If your mech is active, the field instead radiates from and follows the mech.

name: Hammer Strike
description: Chain. Strike your foe.

name: Jade Mortar

name: Endless Night
description: Dual Wield. Fire a beam that hinders foes and helps allies.

Smash the ground, creating three shock waves that deal damage. Deal increased damage to disabled enemies, defiant enemies, and enemies with conditions.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

Mech Command. Pulse a barrier and boons to all nearby allies.

The mech does not count against the target count for this skill.

name: Unleash Ranger
description: Unleash the raw power of your primal bond with nature and your pet, enhancing your offensive power.

name: Triple Threat
description: Fire three missiles that hinder foes and help allies.

name: Enter Shadow Shroud
description: Ally Target: Enter shadow shroud and tether a targeted or previously siphoned ally, granting them barrier. If no target is selected, one will be chosen randomly in the indicated radius.

name: Exit Shadow Shroud
description: Exit your shadow shroud, breaking the tether between you and your ally.

description: Cantrip. Convert all your conditions into vulnerability.

name: Rending Vines
description:
Your pet strikes nearby enemies with vines, removing boons. Disabled or defiant enemies are also slowed.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

description:
Signet Passive: Incoming strike and condition damage is reduced.
Signet Active: Create a projectile-blocking dome around yourself. You and allies inside the dome gain barrier every second. If your mech is active, the dome is centered on it and is larger. 

The mech does not count against the target count for this skill.

name: Measured Shot
description: Dual Wield. Shadowstep and fire a shot that hinders foes and helps allies.

name: Shadowfall
description: Well. Shadowstep to your target location and drop a well that continuously pulls foes to its center, increasing intensity with each hit.

Shadowstep to your target, appearing in a blast of necrotic energy. Daze enemies near your arrival point.

name: Fall of the Axe
description: The Mech Rider swings at the nearest enemy, dealing heavy damage.

name: Jade Ricochet
description: The sniper fires a ricocheting bullet at the target, dealing heavy damage and bouncing to nearby enemies, increasing in damage after each bounce.

name: Gale Breath
description: Beast. Fires a sweeping breath attack, damaging foes.

name: Rain of Blades
description: The Mindblade targets a nearby enemy and, after a short delay, begins creating damaging fields of psychic energy around their target. These fields persist and deal heavy damage in an area.

name: Missed Stroke
description: Paint stroke is sloppy.

name: Storm of Swords
description: The Mindblade creates a series of spells around them, each of which fire a slowly moving field of psychic energy in a direction.

name: Jade Buster Cannon
description: The Mech Rider overloads their power core, releasing a continuous blast of deadly jade energy.

description: Bite your foe, leaving them vulnerable.

name: Heaven's Palm
description: The Enforcer slams the target area with powerful energies, dealing heavy damage and applying extreme vulnerability for a short time. Targets with extreme vulnerability are killed by this attack.

name: Destructive Aura
description: Pulses energy every 3 seconds, damaging all foes in range.

name: Ley Breach
description: A powerful beam strikes from above, charging the ground with ley energies.

name: Reckless Leap
description: The Enforcer leaps to the target area, damaging nearby enemies and knocking them down.

name: Fire Dance
description: Qadim summons forth heavily damaging fire along all nearby metal surfaces, burning and weakening foes.

name: Jade Ricochet
description: The sniper fires a ricocheting bullet at the target, dealing heavy damage and bouncing to nearby enemies, increasing in damage after each bounce.

name: Jade Ricochet
description: The sniper fires a ricocheting bullet at the target, dealing heavy damage and bouncing to nearby enemies.

name: Embalming Barrage
description: A barrage of pistol attacks that inflict poison.

name: Consuming Hatred
description: Channels pure hatred into its target, damaging and immobilizing them.

name: Seismic Stomp
description: The destroyer sends its foes flying with a powerful stomp.

name: Targeted Expulsion
description: Weaves dangerous elemental energies to heavily damage nearby foes.

name: Jade Lob
description: Fires a targeted missile that explodes on impact, creating a persistent field of damaging jade energy.

name: Heaven's Palm
description: The Enforcer slams the target area with powerful energies, dealing heavy damage.

name: Jade Mine
description: Explodes when an enemy enters proximity, dealing heavy damage.

name: Hallucinating Shot
description: A special pistol attack loaded with Ankka's powerful hallucinogens.

name: Explosion
description: Releases latent energy stored within the meteorite, heavily damaging everything in the surrounding area.

name: Cyclone
description: A spinning area attack.

name: Jade Ricochet
description: The sniper fires a ricocheting bullet at the target, dealing heavy damage and bouncing to nearby enemies, increasing in damage after each bounce.

name: Dragon Slash—Rush
description: Minister Li launches forward to a target location, damaging and launching enemies in his path.

name: Mists Projection
description: The Mists tears shoot out projections at player locations. Tears can be closed by stepping into their void.

name: Wave of Torment
description: A horrifying hallucination whose malevolence sucks the life out of anything nearby.

name: Jade Cannon
description: Fire a long-range, slow-moving jade missile that explodes on impact, damaging nearby foes.

name: Toxic Orb
description: An immense, slow-moving orb of crackling energy fired by a hallucination of Scarlet. Applies torment.

name: Storm of Swords

name: Elixir of Ignorance
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of ignorance into an elixir, gaining resistance and breaking stuns, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting blindness on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

name: Rifle Burst Grenade
description: Fire an explosive grenade from your rifle.

name: Elixir of Promise
description:
Elixir. Infuse an elixir with the promise of good health, healing yourself and gaining regeneration, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, poisoning foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double damage and condition duration.

name: Elixir of Ambition
description:
Elixir. Infuse your boundless ambition into an elixir, gaining every possible boon, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting all damaging conditions on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

name: Elixir of Risk
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of risk into an elixir, gaining might and fury, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting weakness on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

name: Elixir of Anguish
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of anguish into an elixir, gaining swiftness and quickness, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, inflicting cripple on foes. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and condition duration.

name: Detonate Cartridges
description: Expends your remaining charges by throwing them at the ground in front of you, launching and damaging foes. Explosion radius increases based on the number of charges spent.

name: Elixir of Bliss
description:
Elixir. Infuse the magical essence of bliss into an elixir, gaining resolution and converting conditions on yourself into life force, and then toss the elixir at the targeted area, corrupting a boon on targets into a condition. If you are in the splash area of the elixir, gain Blight.

If you are at or above the Blight threshold when you activate this skill, consume that amount of Blight to double the damage and corrupt an additional boon on targets.

description: Project a defensive dome and grant stability to allies in the area.

name: Toxic Slice
description: Prototype Arsenite sweeps the area in front of it with its greatsword, dealing minor damage.

name: Exhaust Plume
description: The fiery exhaust from an assault knight's jetpack is dangerous. Deadly, even.

name: Tri-Bolt
description: Prototype Indigo targets three enemies with lightning orbs, which follow their targets then strike an area after a short delay. Every other time this ability is used, one of the three targets will also be targeted by Tribocharge.

name: Volatile Static
description: The Cobalt Knight unleashes an electrified wind that pushes opponents away and shocks them with increasing intensity the farther targets are from the assault knight.

name: Dual Horizon
description: Prototype Vermilion swings its hammer in a circle, generating dangerous gravitational fields. Targets inside the ring receive Tidal Torment. Targets outside the ring receive Ergo Shear. Targets hit by the ring take high damage, receive a random effect, and are knocked in a random direction.

name: Noxious Vapor Blade
description: A swirling blade comprised of toxic gasses slowly tracks its target. After a short delay or upon striking the target, the blade reverses course at high speed, striking everything in its path. Drops Boiling Aether at the location from which it reversed course.

name: Volatile Static
description: Prototype Indigo unleashes chaining static arcs that hit three enemies each. Longer arcs deal increased damage. Struck targets become grounded for a few seconds, protecting them from additional arcs.

name: Gravitational Wave
description: Prototype Vermilion exposes its singularity core, causing ripples in the fabric of reality that damage everything in a large area.

name: Gravitational Wave
description: Prototype Vermilion exposes its singularity core, causing ripples in the fabric of reality that damage everything in a large area.

name: Tribocharge
description: Prototype Indigo tethers a target to a location. Movement away from this location builds up a charge. After a delay, the target is teleported back to the tethered location and takes increased damage based on the distance teleported. This attack creates Boiling Aether at the target's location just before teleportation.

name: Crackling Wind
description: Prototype Indigo becomes the eye of a storm while pushing enemies away. Damage increases with distance. Targets that are pushed too far will also become exposed and empower the prototype.

name: Noxious Return
description: A swirling blade comprised of toxic gasses returns to Prototype Arsenite, striking everything in its path for high damage.

name: Volatile Static
description: The Cobalt Knight unleashes chaining static arcs that hit three enemies each. Longer arcs deal increased damage. Struck targets become grounded for a few seconds, protecting them from additional arcs.

name: Mass Driver
description: Prototype Vermilion strikes enemies before it with a wide swing of its hammer.

name: Noxious Vapor Blade
description: A swirling blade comprised of toxic gasses slowly tracks its target. After a short delay or upon striking the target, the blade reverses course at high speed, striking everything in its path. Drops Boiling Aether at the location from which it reversed course.

name: Gravity Hammer
description: Prototype Vermilion accelerates its hammer into the ground with extreme force, causing moderate damage in a large area. Every other time this skill is used, it creates Boiling Aether at the attack's location.

name: Rupture
description: Prototype Arsenite places a symbol in front of itself and then shatters it with an upswing of its blade, dealing high damage in a small area. Every other time this attack is used, it fires a Noxious Vaporblade at the furthest non-fixated target.

While the fire projectile is active, it grants you increased outgoing damage. While the earth projectile is active, you take reduced damage from strikes. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

name: Breaching Strike
description: Burst. Strike your target and remove boons. Deal more damage if your target has no boons.

description: Dual Attack. Summon projectiles of ice and earth that circle around you, striking enemies they pass through. While the ice projectile is active, you take reduced damage from conditions. While the earth projectile is active, you take reduced damage from strikes. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

name: World Cleaver

name: Charging Constellation

description: Paint stroke is sloppy.
